Summary._: [4] and [5] service has resumed following an earlier incident involving an unruly passenger at 14 St-Union Sq.

Description._: [4] and [5] service has resumed following an earlier incident involving an unruly passenger at 14 St-Union Sq.

Summary._: [B] and [D] trains have service changes and delays because of an earlier incident at 47-50 Sts. Details at mta.info

Description._:
Southbound [B] trains are stopping along the [C] line from 59 St-Columbus Circle to W 4 St-Wash Sq then along the [F] line and end at Church Av.

Some northbound [B] trains are stopping along the [F] line from 47-50 St-Rockefeller Ctr to Lexington/63 St then along the [Q] line and end at 96 St-2 Av.

These service changes are due to electrical repairs because of the earlier incident between 47-50 Sts/Rockefeller Ctr and 7 Av.

Expect extensive delays in [B], [C], [D], [F] and [Q] trains.

LongDescription:
Southbound [B] trains are stopping along the [C] line from 59 St-Columbus Circle to W 4 St-Wash Sq then along the [F] line and end at Church Av. 
Some northbound [B] trains are stopping along the [F] line from 47-50 St-Rockefeller Ctr to Lexington/63 St then along the [Q] line and end at 96 St-2 Av.
These service changes are due to electrical repairs because of the earlier incident between 47-50 Sts/Rockefeller Ctr and 7 Av.
Expect extensive delays in [B], [C], [D], [F] and [Q] trains.
